comments.author: HedgeFx
comments.body: Yes, about every week I need about 400 usd for my bot. If you take a look to loans that Shasan and Alterra gave me you will see how i request (and repaid) single loan of over 400 usdt .Someone asked me why I don’t take loan for longer periods, but I prefer to pay my due in short terms and open new ones again Quote from: Timelord2067 on October 27, 2022, 06:06:02 AMQuote from: HedgeFx on October 27, 2022, 04:55:03 AMTake a look to my historyJust in this thread your loans have stepped up from $150 to $200 now you are asking for $300 (not to mention your last loan was confirmed repaid just six hours ago).
